GeneDef.label: hivemind drone
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are part of the hivemind, but do not contribute any special effects to it.

GeneDef.label: shared skills
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Due to which share some experience in skills.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes the <color=#8a8ae6>skills</color>.
Only the <color=#8a8ae6>level</color> is synchronized, experience is not affected.

GeneDef.label: shared needs
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Due to which they share some of their needs.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes <color=#8a8ae6>needs</color>.
Only <color=#8a8ae6>recreation, comfort, outdoors, indoors, beauty</color> are synchronized.
